Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI provides more general feedback whereas teacher feedback is more to the point

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: GenAI provides recommendations for a direction for improvement while teacher points out what can be improved but not always necessarily how, may be at times confusing

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: GenAI feedback is instant, teacher feedback can take time
